description: This source file defines the AppState class, a ChangeNotifier that manages the global application state related to bootstrapping, authentication, and current user information within a Flutter application.

classes.name: AppState
classes.description: Represents the global state of the app, handling initialization, user authentication status, and current user details, with methods for bootstrapping, login, and logout processes.

methods.name: bootstrap
methods.description: Initializes environment variables, database, and authentication status, updating internal state accordingly.

methods.name: logout
methods.description: Clears stored tokens and resets authentication state.

methods.name: setAuthenticated
methods.description: Sets user as authenticated, stores tokens, and updates user info.
